document.full_text: ubs ag was ordered by a regulator to pay nearly $11 million to settle charges it misled customers about the safety of lehman brothers holdings inc debt before that bank went bankrupt.
document.title: ubs fined for downplaying lehman risk to clients
lines_and_colors: ubs ag was ordered by a regulator to pay nearly $11 million to settle charges it misled customers about the safety of lehman brothers holdings inc debt before that bank went bankrupt.
